name: typescript-strict-typing
description: MANDATORY for ALL TypeScript code: Enforces zero-tolerance type safety - prohibits any, as, @ts-ignore, !, implicit any, unsafe operations. Applies to writing code, fixing bugs, implementing features, refactoring, async handling, data processing, third-party libs. Triggers on: TypeScript, TS, type error, type checking, write code, implement, refactor, fix, async, Promise, array operations, object access.
